I made changes to support moving to entities using scoped names. I also disabled the menu item for entity types like collisions, sensors, levels that are currently not present on the rendering side. [0dea163](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/commits/0dea163313be08fa286fe0a7b44f25a15392a648)

About highlighting items, I’m thinking about what happens if the user clicks on an entity using the transform tool afterwards. The highlighted item in the entity tree should also be updated. This means we probably need a global event to let all gui plugins know when entity is selected, e.g. through a topic?

I made changes to support moving to entities using scoped names. I also disabled the menu item for entity types like collisions, sensors, levels that are currently not present on the rendering side. 0dea163

About highlighting items, I’m thinking about what happens if the user clicks on an entity using the transform tool afterwards. The highlighted item in the entity tree should also be updated. This means we probably need a global event to let all gui plugins know when entity is selected, e.g. through a topic?
